line.text: %ARCADE%: Hi, kids. Welcome to a little pinball game I call 'Sudden Death'. It's been a smashing success with everyone who's played it ... may they rest in peace.

response.text: %PLAYER%: What do you think this is, Arcade? Some kind of game?

line.text: %ARCADE%: Indeed I do. And of course I'll only run a fair game, so all you have to do is get 1 million points to win. How hard can that be?

response.text: %PLAYER%: Arcade, we're not going to take part in this sadistic trap of yours.

line.text: %ARCADE%: I can see you're anxious to play. So get ready ... get set ... GO!
